nars.entity
Class Stamp

java.lang.Object
  nars.entity.Stamp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Stamp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

Each Sentence has a time stamp, consisting the following components: (1) The creation time of the sentence, (2) The time when the truth-value is supported, (3) A trail of serial numbers of sentence, from which the sentence is derived. Each input sentence gets a unique serial number. The derived sentences inherits serial numbers from its parents, cut at the length limit.

Method Detail

make

public static Stamp make(Stamp first,
                         Stamp second)
Try to merge two Stamps, return null if have overlap

By default, the event time of the first stamp is used in the result

Parameters:
first - The first Stamp
second - The second Stamp
Returns:
The merged Stamp, or null
